data.eml:eml: On Plesionika persica (Kemp, 1925) and P. reflexa Chace, 1985 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pandalidae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chan, Tin-Yam, Chakraborty, Rekha Devi, Purushothaman, P., Kuberan, G., Yang, Chien-Hui (2018): On Plesionika persica (Kemp, 1925) and P. reflexa Chace, 1985 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Pandalidae) from India. Zootaxa 4382 (3): 583-591, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4382.3.9
